channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Southwest Airlines’ investor day: 3 things to know ahead of ‘pivotal’ event
item.description: Thursday’s investor day comes as Southwest struggles to return to profitability and faces heated investor activism.

item.title: My husband’s pension was $8,000 a month. As his survivor, I only get $1,800. Can I fight this?
Another reason Qualcomm shouldn’t buy Intel? Its bonds could reach junk status.
item.description: GimmeCredit started coverage of Qualcomm’s bonds Wednesday with a bearish rating.

item.title: Sitting out August’s stock-market selloff paid off for retail investors
item.description: Most retail investors didn’t trade during the Aug. 5 selloff, and those who did largely bought the dip.

item.title: Buy the stocks of these companies helping fuel the ‘AI gold rush,’ analyst says
item.description: With demand for the use of artificial intelligence expected to continue to surge, Oppenheimer analyst Edward Yang recommended investors buy the stocks...
